sub_title: Geologist | Business Manager | Technology & Solutions Development
summary:
Gustavo is a Brazilian geologist who obtained his masters degree in International Business at Hult International Business School, in Shanghai, China. He worked in exploration and mining projects in Brazil, until he transferred to a mining operation in Chile, where he was responsible for research and production of ore exported to China. Gustavo then specialized his career in international business and moved to China, where he worked as a data scientist and was involved in development of IoT applications for ore supply chain management and optimization. Gustavo is currently based in Amsterdam working as a Product Manager for a company that develops technology and solutions for the Mining and Natural Resources industries.

"Count on me because I have a firm commitment to accomplishments."
